content: Had a great meeting today over in #t-compiler/meetings > [steering meeting] 2021-03-23 “G. P.’s” compiler-team#424 regarding https://hackmd.io/TYGRjVIbSBmxpbcfDzll-w?view
we’ll be working on a next iteration of the doc that will make a smaller set of broader principles (and just move a number of the current ones as specific examples in sub-bullets)
I made an initial doc for that work, here: https://hackmd.io/24XY68xUSkyqDAv0w8HmYw ; it is a blank slate at moment.
